summary: Standalone Heavy Armor in the form of some hardcore ragged warmup pants. Do you think anyone wants a roundhouse kick in the face while you\'re wearing these badboys? I don\'t think so.
descriptionHtml:
This is [color=red]NOT a retexture[/color]. This is the first standalone armor I\'ve created thanks to Lateraliss\' standalone armor tutorial found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6677

These pants are Heavy Armor, craftable, and upgradeable. Craft it at the forge; you need 2 wolf pelts, 1 linen wrap, and 4 leather. Upgrade cost is 1 bear pelt. [color=yellow][b]Note:[/b] These pants count as chest armor.[/color] 

Or if you want the item right away just type in the item code: player.additem 15001000 1 


If you\'re wondering why these pants are heavy armor it\'s because I don\'t like fist fighting in light armor. Personal Preference is mainly the reason.

Install: Move all the files into your skyrim/data folder or use nexus mod manager and remember to check the esp. and that it\'s activated.

Thanks for taking interest, have fun.

[color=red]1.2 update**[/color]
[color=yellow]Added the remaining pieces of the Rex-Kwon-Do Armor set. All craftable/upgradeable. [/color]
author: MrSamB
